11.title: Male ruler (natural weight gain only)

112.content:
You wake up in your extravagant bed, your young plump wife has her arms wrapped around you. She's put on some more weight since your wedding. She was incomparably beautiful and had stellar proportions that you knew superfluous deposits of fat would only enhance. At the time she certainly wasn't the fattest girl but you knew that you could easily remedy that via constant eating and providing her with a fashionable sedentary lifestyle any of your female subjects would die for. You love immersing her in luxury, supplying her with decadent foods, gorgeous dresses, glittering jewelry, obedient servants, and captivating amusements. Under your affluence, she barely had to lift a finger.

"Wake up my dear." you gently nudge your sleeping wife. "YAWN what am I having for breakfast today?" your wife asks stretching her arms out. "Let's see." You say as you clap your hands, signaling for service. At the call 2 fat servant women enter pushing a cart loaded with food. "Good morning your highness." the servants respectfully greet. Your wife leans up slightly groggy "I hope you brought me something sweet." She stated as she rubbed her eye. "Of course milady" responded one of the servants placing a tray in front of her. The tray was filled with pastries, cake, and donuts. A little smile formed on your wife's face as she reached for a slice of cake. "That's a good girl." you encourage her. "And when the lady's done with the sweets we have the meat portion" informed the second servant unveiling a tray brimming with bacon, sausages, steak, and eggs. "Great. Be sure she finishes it." you instruct as the servant girls nod in compliance. "Alright I've got a full day ahead of me." you announce as you dress yourself and set off for the day. "I'm off honey, be sure to get enough to eat today." you say as you kiss her forehead since her mouth was busy chewing. "Kay" she muffles shoving an eclair in her mouth.

You head to your throne room to conduct business. Walking through the halls you see your servants doing chores, all of them overweight women. This is because you rule an island that makes obesity compulsory for women. Coming to the realization that society benefits from having fat women, you mandated that your female subjects be put on special diets designed to add weight to their figures. Success was nearly immediate upon elimination of under fed women as prosperity became ubiquitous throughout the island. No longer concerning themselves with dissatisfying diets, women could eat whatever they wanted causing the island's food industry to flourish. Sure their fat hindered their movement but it made them more fertile. Plus the atmosphere grew amiable as the abundant food the women ate made them jolly and pleasant. After all a society that keeps its women happy is guaranteed to succeed.

You arrive at your throne room were your ____ is waiting for you.
112.title: A young plump woman

1121.content:

She kept her long silver hair tied up during business hours. Julie is very loyal and happy to obey your command although she can be a little hotheaded with the other servants especially if they look too thin. Julie is also pragmatic and dutifully monitors the kingdom ready at a moment's glance to inform you of situations. You couldn't ask for a better assistant.

You see Julie deeply content as she scarfed on a huge apple fritter. "Nom oh sooo goood" Julie moaned wiggling her ass in elation. "A-hem" you make yourself known. "Oh master! gulp I've prepared NOMPH a synopsis of GULP the island." Julie muffles words through her fritter filled mouth, quickly finishing it and reaching for her clipboard. "Ah excellent work Julie." You express appreciation. "Why thank you master it's my honor." Julie ecstatically replies giving a salute. You peer over at Julie and notice her hanging belly. "I see your belly hangs now, Julie." "MM Hmm! I'm up another 10 pounds." Julie proudly informed grabbing a thick bulge of fat. "It looks wonderful on you." you compliment. "Oh why master, thanks..." Julie blushes.

Reading through the synopsis you notice something. "Hey Julie what's this?" you ask. Julie snaps out of her high from your compliment "Wha- oh yes, Master that's the average recorded weight of our nation's teenage girls." Julie explains. "Hmmm seems.."
1121.title: assistant

11211.content:
"A bit low compared to the rest of the female population. Aren't they following the nation's diet? " Julie sensed the hint of disapproval in your voice. "They are my liege, but I'm afraid some immigrants still retained certain uncomely habits." Julie stated handing you a clipboard. Julie folds her arms under her huge breasts as you read the data. According to the dismal notes, girls moving to your island nation, continue exercising. The teen girls obey the law and eat the food expected of them but in their free time would exercise. Such harmful activities included jogging, biking, and calisthenics. Provided images displayed young ladies their heavy boobs stuffed sports bras and paunchy bellies sloping above their tight gym shorts, all foolishly burning beautiful calories. Each picture contained girls jogging together, sitting their plump rears on bikes, and performing situps and every girl looked sweaty and stressed.

"Illegalizing exercise for girls may be a bit too drastic. Afterall physical exertion is unnatural for women, they'd much rather basked in comfort and eat delicious foods." "You truly understand women, master!" Julie praised, swept by your cunning intellect. "Simply stifling their exercise should suffice this senseless abomination." you turn to your silver haired assistant "We could stress how exercise is self abuse for girls. Warn families of daughters suspected of exercising. We'll run a campaign showing images of emaciated women from around the world." you say as you grab another apple fritter and fed it to Julie. "The schools will have to up the calories in the food they serve girls. Why we could even give tax cuts to families with daughters weighing over 300 pounds."

Julie happily takes a bite from the fritter and bounces her 260 pound mass utterly impressed by your plan. "Another ingenious plan, master!" Julie's words accompanied her huge jiggling boobs. "I'll get right on it." Julie says nearly dashing out the door before you catch her arm. "Wait a minute Julie." Julie White obediently stops, excited to see why you've stopped her, and hoping that you're pleased with how flabby her arm has gotten. "Pleasure before business, how about you..."
11211.title: teenage girls require discipline

"and to think it only took a month for your agenda to successfully plump our girls up to our proud nation's standards." Julie praised utterly incapable of restraining her adoration. "It was nothing really. They are impressionable teens afterall, all we had to do was convince them that fat girls were fashionable. Simply presenting them with a plethora of images of gorgeous bbw women proudly showing off their flab and bulges was enough to persuade the girls to hit the buffet." You pull out a picture of a hefty girl in a tube top striking a suggestive pose. "To further ensure the girls' ascent into obesity, I banned the sale of cute clothes in sizes 16 and under. The thin girls will have no other option other then to dress their malnourished body in rags. Now, the youths have been swept up by the weight gaining trend." you explained.

"Excellent sir!" Julie congratulated as she excitedly clapped her hands. "And the islands already reaping in the benefits from the girls' higher weights." Julie pulled out a clipboard. "Better attitudes, better grades, no bullying..." Julie read on and on of the new benefits the fat teenage girls bestowed upon the island. "Oh the benefits of fat to women are endless!"Julie squealed hugging the clipboard against her ample busom.

People are free to pursue their interest which has resulted in advanced lifestyles. Culture does vary among each island though. However, one thing remains ubiquitous throughout the island nation and that's the preference in women. Reaching every corner of the island nation was the adoration of female obesity. Women were worshiped for their higher weights. Their soft rolls and folds garnered much praise from men and women alike. The island nation's society was hyper accommodating for larger women offering facilitating services to it's corpulent females.

The oldest artifacts depicted women as fat vixens. History does show that there were a women who were unfortunately thin but after the empire rose to power, prosperity erupted and mal-nourished women were completely eliminated.

Unlike the rest of the world, slavery on the island is much more gentle, masters being quite hospitable to their slaves. Afterall fat women were craved and anguished girls don't gain much weight.

Cornelia was filled ambition, craving change seeing women constantly be deprived of delicious foods and deceived into starving themselves. Cornelia could no longer stand to see women bereft of life's pleasures. She had grown sick of skinny women being the social standard and knew deep down that fat women were truly the ideal, despite weighing only 120 pounds herself (at the time). Using her enormous affluence Cornelia acquired an island and managed to create a kingdom. Cornelia declared herself queen and vowed that no woman would be malnourished under her rule. Women were pampered and grew very fat and thanks to Cornelia's developed society, women could relax all day and bask in luxury. 144.content:
You used to be average young woman in the United States of America, but that all changed on your twenty-first birthday when your powers first awoke. You still weren’t sure how or why, but you suddenly found yourself with seemingly godlike powers; you weren’t able to change all of reality with a whim, but your powers were developing more and more over time as well. After having some fun with your newfound abilities for a while, you discovered that your powers were having an additional effect on you as well: the more you used your powers the more your body slowly but surely fattened. This actually proved a great joy to you, since you had always wanted to get rid of your stick thin and barely feminine body, but your genes had never allowed it to happen. You were actually a bit shocked that you hadn’t thought of using your powers to correct that once they had awakened, but were now quite happy with that development.

Eventually, you quietly took possession of a remote island and set up a thriving queemdom, with yourself as the Goddess queen. Your realm started with just a handful of people that willing came to live on the island with you as their ruler. That was nearly two years and more than nine hundred glorious pounds ago, and your subjects have swelled to nearly a hundred people, mostly women but with more than a few men mixed in as well. Using your abilities, you made all of your female subjects much more susceptible to gaining fat, while the men stayed skinny or turned into muscular hunks. You didn’t much care for the gentlemen, being such a committed lesbian, but you understood that some of your female subjects preferred the touch of a man. You, on the other hand, kept a harem of a handful of women who were eager to serve your needs in return for your personal blessings on each of them. Each of the five was marked with special tattoo above their bountiful breasts, though each was beyond noticeable for being the fattest women on the island, except for you of course.

Even now, you were resting your bulk on the mound of cushions that served as your throne. Your perfectly tanned and blemish free skin glistened because of a fresh coating of fragrant oil applied to your body. Your more than half ton body was entirely on display, adorned with only several thin and long golden chains looped around the thick collar of fat covering your neck, as well as a pair of jeweled rings on each of your plump hands. Nearly spherical orbs of flesh made up your breasts, a far cry from the tiny mosquito bumps you used to have. They rested heavily on the sweeping expanse of your mammoth gut, a temple devoted to your gluttony and power. This mound of flesh oozed over the tree trunk thighs below, which did little to hide the swell of your weighty rump behind and below you. Your thighs spilled over your knees, pushing the fat of your calves further down across your ankles. A golden tiara was nestled atop your head, glinting out of the thick dark crimson curls of your hair, curls that flowed down from your head and cascaded around your massive girth.

Two of your companions lounged against you, while the other three are off stuffing themselves for your pleasure. You would rather be with them and taking a personal part in their continuing weight gain, but pressing business had required your attention. That business involved the lone person standing before you, basking in your glory and asking a boon of you.
144.title: It’s good to be queen

choices: “Take the chalice there and drink deep from that spring.”
You came up with another test for the woman.
1441.content:
She was a tall, slender woman with a respectable bust and rump and a short ponytail of brown hair draping down her back. She had just requested to live on the island, but you didn’t answer yet, instead you paid close attention to the emotions flitting across her face and her body language. Despite the hint of embarrassment at seeing such a massive woman so completely naked, you also detected a touch of reverence and awe at being before you. Most of the people that had come to your island knew full well what happened to women here, and all embraced it even if they didn’t at first. That made you think back to when another woman showed up here, asking for admittance, nearly a year ago. She was barely out of her teens and bright and full of life, but it turned out she was an aspiring reporter hoping to catch her big break by escaping with the story of what transpired on your island. The addition of nearly three hundred pounds bloating her formerly thin frame, as well as being a focal point of several of the regular orgies held on the island had showed her how good things could be here; last you heard of her, she had settled down with one of the other young women and become quite content with her new life.

Turning your attention back to the woman before you, you saw that she was still quietly and eagerly waiting for your answer. Instead of responding directly, you asked the two women lounging against your mass what they thought, just to draw things out a bit further.

Aziza, an ebony skinned and raven haired former model, responded first with “We should let her join us, my lady. All who come should experience the joy we feel here on your island.”

“I think we should test her first, my queen,” the formerly statuesque Russian military woman, Svetlana, countered. “Make her prove that she truly wishes to join our way of living.

Looking down at the platinum blond woman, you could tell that she was likely thinking of the reporter woman as well.

“That is an excellent suggestion, Svetlana,” and the woman beamed because of your compliment. Turning your gaze back to the prospective subject, you then said “Before I can accept you, you will have to undergo a little test, nothing too complex mind you.”

A brief expression of shock came over her face before she bowed her head and said as respectfully as she could, “Of course, anything.”

“Mm-mmm,” was your response, before you laid out what she had to do.
1441.title: The new girl

Some gods wanted a beautiful obese wife or other goddesses would desire a servant girl. The goddess did yearn for true love though and planned on marriage one day were she'd find a king who reveled in fattening women up.
